definitions.definition: The act or service of welcoming , receiving , hosting , or entertaining guests ; an appropriate attitude of openness, respect, and generosity toward guests.
examples: Please thank our hosts for their hospitality during the week that we stayed.

definitions.definition: The business of providing catering, lodging and entertainment service; the industry which includes the operation of hotels, restaurants, and similar enterprises.
examples: After graduating from college, she found a job in hospitality .

definitions.definition: The food, drink, and entertainment given to customers by a company or organization or provided to visitors by a private host.

main_definition: The act or service of welcoming , receiving , hosting , or entertaining guests ; an appropriate attitude of openness, respect, and generosity toward guests.
secondary_definitions: ( business ) The business of providing catering, lodging and entertainment service; the industry which includes the operation of hotels, restaurants, and similar enterprises.
The food, drink, and entertainment given to customers by a company or organization or provided to visitors by a private host.
